script.name: plugin.piracy.enslavepassengers
script.description: Piracy: Enslave Passengers: Enslave/extort your pasengers

line.comment: * SCRIPT NAME: ENSLAVE PASSENGERS
* DESCRIPTION: Enslave/extort/murder passengers onboard your ship
* NOTES: Script is arranged into three phases of dialog then logic: 'passengers', 'survivors' and 'finale'.
* NOTES: Constants are defined below and in three subprocs called immediately afterwards
* AUTHOR: mr.bear DATE: 28 December 2013
* TODO: enslaving pirates angers Pirates and impresses nations
* TODO: enslaving attracts police vessels (perhaps more so in core systems)
* TODO: Include military personnel, prisoners, passengers, demonstrators + VIPs.
* - Might be easier to add that to your STEAL CARGO script - converts those people into proper passengers..
* DEFINE BRIBES/PENALTIES
* ANALYSE CURRENT SECTOR
* STORE INITIAL PLAYER RANK
* CHECK REQUIREMENTS + ENUMERATE PASSENGERS
* INFO: 'You have %s passengers on board that have not been previously extorted, and some may be willing to pay to avoid being enslaved.'
* INFO: 'You have no passengers on board that have not been previously extorted.'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: You can extort %s passengers for up to %s credits'
* $iBribeSize = [THIS]-> call named script: script='plugin.piracy.lib.ui', 'CommaDelimitNumber', $BONUS.MAX.BRIBE, null, null, null
* $szItem = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE textid=23, $BONUS.MAX.PASSENGERS, $iBribeSize, null, null, null
* add custom menu info line to array $aMenu: text=$szItem
* Display details only when passengers available
* INFO: 'BONUS: Enslaving in a %s system does not affect your rank.'
* Check for an inhabited system
* INFO: 'WARNING: Enslaving here will decrease your rank with the %s.'
* INFO: 'WARNING: Enslaving in a core system doubles your rank decrease.'
* INFO: 'WARNING: The %s will revoke your police license for this.'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Your rank with %s is currently %s (%s %).'
* HEADING: 'Select Extortion Bribe'
* SELECTION: Lookup Bribe sizes
* SELECTION: Display victim groups sizes generated during passenger enumeration
* COMMAND: MORE INFO : 'View Requirements for Bribes and Passenger Groups' / 'Info'
* HEADING: 'Available Actions' / 'Rank Change'
* Display commands only when passengers available
* COMMAND: TAKE BRIBES [MEDIUM] : 'Extort passengers (enslave the rest)' / '[Medium]'
* DISABLED: 'Extort passengers (enslave the rest)' / '[Need nn Low-yield Sidearms}]'
* COMMAND: ENSLAVE ALL [SMALL] : 'Enslave all passengers (take no bribes)' / '[Small]'
* COMMAND: CLOSE INTERFACE : 'Close Enslave Passengers Interface' / 'None'
* DISPLAY MENU
* CLOSED: QUIT
* Get menu result (Returned in array due to comboBoxes)
* SET VICTIM GROUP SIZE
* ENSLAVE ALL: Low penalty
* ENSLAVE/BRIBE: Calculate bribe using selected bribe index
* Random percentage / Medium Penalty
* MORE INFORMATION: Display sub-dialog displaying requirements
* QUIT
* DEBUG: Disable enslaving
* CALCULATE NUMBER ENSLAVED
* EXTORT/ENSLAVE TRAVELLERS
* Enslave passengers (actually destroy) or set local variable preventing them from being re-used
* Passengers array now contains only those extorted ('the survivors')
* Manually convert passengers to slaves in single action so audio plays correctly
* OPTIONAL: CREDIT BRIBES (Zero if all enslaved)
* ALTER RANK
* IF PASSENGERS ARE PART OF A MISSION, GIVE GAME TIME TO IMPLEMENT ITS OWN NOTORIETY PENALTY
* INFO: 'You have enslaved %s passengers and earned %s credits. You have told the remaining %s passengers you intend to free them...'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Your cargo bay now contains %s %s.'
* Remove police license
* INFO: 'WARNING: The %s have revoked your police license.'
* INFO: 'WARNING: Your standing with the %s has dropped %s ranks.'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Your rank with %s is currently %s (%s %).'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Your standing with Pirates has increased.'
* HEADING: 'Available Actions' / 'Rank Change'
* Display further options only if there are passengers remaining
* COMMAND: MURDER [HIGH] : 'Shoot them! (+10,000 cr each)' / '[High]'
* DISABLED: 'Shoot them! (+10,000 cr each)' / '[Need nn Marines/Rifles]'
* COMMAND: ENSLAVE [MEDIUM] : 'Enslave them anyway (+10,000 cr each)' / '[Medium]'
* DISABLED: 'Enslave them anyway (+10,000 cr each)' / '[Need nn Rifles]'
* COMMAND: DEPART [NONE] : REQUIRES DOCKED : 'Allow them to depart immediately' / '[None]'
* COMMAND: EJECT [SMALL] : REQUIRES SPACE : 'Eject them into space immediately' / '[Small]'
* COMMAND: QUIT [NONE] : 'Let them depart at the next station as promised' / '[None]'
* COMMAND: QUIT : 'Close Enslave Passengers Interface' / 'None'
* DISPLAY
* CHECK FOR CANCEL
* Preserve notoriety ranking
* MURDER / DEPART/ ENSLAVE: Destroy the passenger
* Calculate appropriate penalty + Load text description
* EJECT: 'Please wait while the remaining %s passengers are securely escorted to the airlock in small groups...'
* ENSLAVE: 'The remaining %s passengers have been successfully enslaved.'
* Manually convert passengers to slaves in single action so audio plays correctly
* MURDER: Convert passengers into Chelts Meat
* MURDER: 'The remaining %s passengers have been successfully murdered. The bodies have been disguised as %s units of %s.'
* DEPART: 'The remaining %s passengers have departed peacefully.'
* ALTER NOTORIETY
* INFO: 'The remaining %s passengers have been successfully ejected/enslaved/murdered. [bodies changed into chelts meat]'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Your cargo bay now contains %s slaves.'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Ejected pilots will return to a nearby friendly station'
* Display no rank information if we let the people go freely
* INFO: 'WARNING: Your standing with the %s has dropped %s ranks.'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Your rank with %s is currently %s (%s %).'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Your standing with Pirates has increased.'
* EJECT: Display the progress section
* HEADING: 'Information Available' / 'Progress'
* ITEM: 'Ejecting Passengers' / 'Waiting'
* HEADING: 'Available Actions' / 'Rank Change'
* COMMAND: QUIT : 'Close Enslave Passengers Interface' / 'None'
* DISPLAY STATIC or DYNAMIC MENU
* QUIT
* PROC: DEFINE REQUIREMENTS (Format: ActorType, ActorCount, WeaponType, MaxPassenger, MaxBribeID)
* PROCEDURE: ADD MENU HEADING WITH 'ACTIONS AVAILABLE' / 'RANK CHANGE'
* PROCEDURE: ADD MENU INFO LINE SHOWING CURRENT RANK
* INFO: 'NOTICE: Your rank with %s is currently %s (%s %).'
* PROCEDURE: DISPLAY NUMBER OF RANKS DROPPED
* INFO: 'WARNING: Your standing with the %s has dropped %s ranks.'
* PROCEDURE: ADD CURRENT COMMAND TO MENU
* INPUT: $left, $right, $return
* FUNCTION: DISPLAY MENU WITH UNIFORM TITLE/DESCRIPTION
* RESULT: On return 'szItemChosen' contains the menu option selected
* PROCEDURE: ADD MENU INFO LINE SHOWING SLAVES IN CARGO BAY
* PROCEDURE: DISPLAY CLOSE INTERFACE COMMAND
* COMMAND: CLOSE INTERFACE : 'Close Enslave Passengers Interface' / 'None'
* PROCEDURE: Force display of a dynamically updating menu until ejection process has completed
* Set process/dialog mutexes
* Launch ejection script asynchronously
* FORCE DISPLAY UNTIL COMPLETE + QUIT
* Reset dialog mutex
* PROCEDURE: DISPLAY SUBMENU EXPLAINING RULES
* INFO: 'The number of passengers you can enslave and the bribes you can demand are determined by manpower and weaponry.'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: You need at least %s to extort your passengers.'
* INFO: 'NOTICE: You need %s or %s to enable special actions.'
* INFO : 'The requirements you currently meet are highlighted below'
* HEADING: 'Requirements' / 'Max Passengers / Max Bribe'
* ITEM: '1 x Marine + Low-yield Sidearms' / '10 passengers, 25,000 credits'
* Requirements Format := ActorType, ActorCount, WeaponType, MaxPassenger, MaxBribeID
* LHS: '%s x %s + %s'. eg. '1 x Marine + Low-yield Sidearms' (Highlight text if requirement is met)
* RHS: '%s passengers, %s credits'. eg '10 passengers, 25,000 credits' (Highlight text if requirement is met)
* ITEM: '1 x Marine + Low-yield Sidearms' / '10 passengers, 25,000 credits'
* HEADING: 'Actions Available'
* COMMAND: EXIT : 'Return to Enslave Passengers Interface'
* Display menu : 'Enslave Passengers' / 'BearCorp Technologies'
* FUNCTION: Enumerate Passengers that have not been previously extorted
* RESULT: aPassengers : Array of Passengers not been previously extorted, limited to the maximum allowable group size
* RESULT: $PASSENGERS.COUNT : Size of above array $PASSENGERS.TOTAL : Actual number aboard not prev extorted
* RESULT: $GROUP.SIZES : Passenger group sizes $GROUP.OPTIONS: Passenger group size comboBox values array
* Exclude passengers that have previously been extorted
* Limit passengers to maximum group size
* Generate passenger group size selection array (Limit group sizes to multiples of 5)
* Display as '%s passengers'
* Add passenger count as final (default) value
* Sort in descending order
* FUNCTION: REDUCES RANKING WITH SECTOR OWNER, INCREASES RANKING WITH PIRATES
* INPUT: $iRankPenalty : Positive amount to increase/decrease notoriety
* Decrease ranking with race who own this sector
* Core sector: Double decrease
* Increase ranking with pirates
* Re-calculate notoriety rank
* FUNCTION: CHECKS WHICH REQUIREMENTS ARE MET BY USER (Req Format := ActorType, ActorCount, WeaponType, MaxPassenger, MaxBribeID)
* RESULT: Initialises all BONUS.xxx constants
* CHECK FOR MARINES and WEAPONS
* Determine max bribe size + group size by comparing marines/weapons onboard to requirements
* MATCH: Set maximum number of passengers enslaved (if larger)
* MATCH: Set maximum bribe size (if larger)
* EXTRACT BRIBE AMOUNT
* ENABLE/DISABLE SPECIAL ACTIONS:
* EXTORTION DISABLED HINT: '[Need 1 Sidearm]'
* ENSLAVING DISABLED HINT: '[Need 2 Rifles + 1 Marine]'
* MURDER DISABLED HINT: '[Need 3 Rifles + 2 Marine]'
* FUNCTION: Match 'oRequirement' against the marines/weapons aboard (Format := ActorType, ActorCount, WeaponType, MaxPassenger, MaxBribeID)
* RESULT: 'bMatch' : TRUE/FALSE
* Pilot: Check the appropriate weapon is present
* Marine: Check enough marines present + enough sidearms (for them and pilot)
* Marine: Check enough marines present + enough rifles (for them and pilot)
* PROCEDURE: Play speech clip: 'Cargobay now contains slaves'

sval.val: Piracy: Enslave Passengers: Enslave/extort your pasengers
Executing ENSLAVE PASSENGERS
Change Extortion Bribe
Change Group Size
queryRequirements: $BONUS.MARINES.COUNT=%s $BONUS.SIDEARMS.COUNT=%s $BONUS.RIFLES.COUNT=%s
queryRequirements: $BONUS.MAX.BRIBE.ID=%s $BONUS.MAX.BRIBE=%s $BONUS.ENABLED.EXTORT=%s $BONUS.ENABLED.ENSLAVE=%s $BONUS.ENABLED.MURDER=%s
matchRequirement: $oActor=%s $iActorCount=%s $oWeapon=%s $bMatch=%s
SCRIPT NAME: ENSLAVE АБВДЖИМПСЛ PASSENGERS
DESCRIPTION: Enslave/extort/murder passengers onboard your ship
NOTES: Script is arranged into three phases of dialog then logic: 'passengers', 'survivors' and 'finale'.
NOTES: Constants are defined below and in three subprocs called immediately afterwards
AUTHOR: mr.bear DATE: 28 December 2013
TODO: enslaving pirates angers Pirates and impresses nations
TODO: enslaving attracts police vessels (perhaps more so in core systems)
TODO: Include military personnel, prisoners, passengers, demonstrators + VIPs.
- Might be easier to add that to your STEAL CARGO script - converts those people into proper passengers..
DEFINE BRIBES/PENALTIES
ANALYSE CURRENT SECTOR
STORE INITIAL PLAYER RANK
CHECK REQUIREMENTS + ENUMERATE PASSENGERS
INFO: 'You have %s passengers on board that have not been previously extorted, and some may be willing to pay to avoid being enslaved.'
INFO: 'You have no passengers on board that have not been previously extorted.'
INFO: 'NOTICE: You can extort %s passengers for up to %s credits'
$iBribeSize = [THIS]-> call named script: script='plugin.piracy.lib.ui', 'CommaDelimitNumber', $BONUS.MAX.BRIBE, null, null, null
$szItem = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE textid=23, $BONUS.MAX.PASSENGERS, $iBribeSize, null, null, null
add custom menu info line to array $aMenu: text=$szItem
Display details only when passengers available
INFO: 'BONUS: Enslaving in a %s system does not affect your rank.'
Check for an inhabited system
INFO: 'WARNING: Enslaving here will decrease your rank with the %s.'
INFO: 'WARNING: Enslaving in a core system doubles your rank decrease.'
INFO: 'WARNING: The %s will revoke your police license for this.'
INFO: 'NOTICE: Your rank with %s is currently %s (%s %).'
HEADING: 'Select Extortion Bribe'
SELECTION: Lookup Bribe sizes
SELECTION: Display victim groups sizes generated during passenger enumeration
COMMAND: MORE INFO : 'View Requirements for Bribes and Passenger Groups' / 'Info'
HEADING: 'Available Actions' / 'Rank Change'
Display commands only when passengers available
COMMAND: TAKE BRIBES [MEDIUM] : 'Extort passengers (enslave the rest)' / '[Medium]'
DISABLED: 'Extort passengers (enslave the rest)' / '[Need nn Low-yield Sidearms}]'
COMMAND: ENSLAVE ALL [SMALL] : 'Enslave all passengers (take no bribes)' / '[Small]'
COMMAND: CLOSE INTERFACE : 'Close Enslave Passengers Interface' / 'None'
DISPLAY MENU
CLOSED: QUIT
Get menu result (Returned in array due to comboBoxes)
SET VICTIM GROUP SIZE
ENSLAVE ALL: Low penalty
ENSLAVE/BRIBE: Calculate bribe using selected bribe index
Random percentage / Medium Penalty
MORE INFORMATION: Display sub-dialog displaying requirements
DEBUG: Disable enslaving
CALCULATE NUMBER ENSLAVED
EXTORT/ENSLAVE TRAVELLERS
Enslave passengers (actually destroy) or set local variable preventing them from being re-used
Passengers array now contains only those extorted ('the survivors')
Manually convert passengers to slaves in single action so audio plays correctly
OPTIONAL: CREDIT BRIBES (Zero if all enslaved)
ALTER RANK
IF PASSENGERS ARE PART OF A MISSION, GIVE GAME TIME TO IMPLEMENT ITS OWN NOTORIETY PENALTY
INFO: 'You have enslaved %s passengers and earned %s credits. You have told the remaining %s passengers you intend to free them...'
INFO: 'NOTICE: Your cargo bay now contains %s %s.'
Remove police license
INFO: 'WARNING: The %s have revoked your police license.'
INFO: 'WARNING: Your standing with the %s has dropped %s ranks.'
INFO: 'NOTICE: Your rank with %s is currently %s (%s %).'
INFO: 'NOTICE: Your standing with Pirates has increased.'
HEADING: 'Available Actions' / 'Rank Change'
Display further options only if there are passengers remaining
COMMAND: MURDER [HIGH] : 'Shoot them! (+10,000 cr each)' / '[High]'
DISABLED: 'Shoot them! (+10,000 cr each)' / '[Need nn Marines/Rifles]'
COMMAND: ENSLAVE [MEDIUM] : 'Enslave them anyway (+10,000 cr each)' / '[Medium]'
DISABLED: 'Enslave them anyway (+10,000 cr each)' / '[Need nn Rifles]'
COMMAND: DEPART [NONE] : REQUIRES DOCKED : 'Allow them to depart immediately' / '[None]'
COMMAND: EJECT [SMALL] : REQUIRES SPACE : 'Eject them into space immediately' / '[Small]'
COMMAND: QUIT [NONE] : 'Let them depart at the next station as promised' / '[None]'
COMMAND: QUIT : 'Close Enslave Passengers Interface' / 'None'
DISPLAY
CHECK FOR CANCEL
Preserve notoriety ranking
MURDER / DEPART/ ENSLAVE: Destroy the passenger
Calculate appropriate penalty + Load text description
EJECT: 'Please wait while the remaining %s passengers are securely escorted to the airlock in small groups...'
ENSLAVE: 'The remaining %s passengers have been successfully enslaved.'
Manually convert passengers to slaves in single action so audio plays correctly
MURDER: Convert passengers into Chelts Meat
MURDER: 'The remaining %s passengers have been successfully murdered. The bodies have been disguised as %s units of %s.'
DEPART: 'The remaining %s passengers have departed peacefully.'
ALTER NOTORIETY
INFO: 'The remaining %s passengers have been successfully ejected/enslaved/murdered. [bodies changed into chelts meat]'
INFO: 'NOTICE: Your cargo bay now contains %s slaves.'
INFO: 'NOTICE: Ejected pilots will return to a nearby friendly station'
Display no rank information if we let the people go freely
INFO: 'WARNING: Your standing with the %s has dropped %s ranks.'
INFO: 'NOTICE: Your rank with %s is currently %s (%s %).'
INFO: 'NOTICE: Your standing with Pirates has increased.'
EJECT: Display the progress section
HEADING: 'Information Available' / 'Progress'
ITEM: 'Ejecting Passengers' / 'Waiting'
HEADING: 'Available Actions' / 'Rank Change'
COMMAND: QUIT : 'Close Enslave Passengers Interface' / 'None'
DISPLAY STATIC or DYNAMIC MENU
PROC: DEFINE REQUIREMENTS (Format: ActorType, ActorCount, WeaponType, MaxPassenger, MaxBribeID)
PROCEDURE: ADD MENU HEADING WITH 'ACTIONS AVAILABLE' / 'RANK CHANGE'
PROCEDURE: ADD MENU INFO LINE SHOWING CURRENT RANK
INFO: 'NOTICE: Your rank with %s is currently %s (%s %).'
PROCEDURE: DISPLAY NUMBER OF RANKS DROPPED
INFO: 'WARNING: Your standing with the %s has dropped %s ranks.'
PROCEDURE: ADD CURRENT COMMAND TO MENU
INPUT: $left, $right, $return
FUNCTION: DISPLAY MENU WITH UNIFORM TITLE/DESCRIPTION
RESULT: On return 'szItemChosen' contains the menu option selected
PROCEDURE: ADD MENU INFO LINE SHOWING SLAVES IN CARGO BAY
PROCEDURE: DISPLAY CLOSE INTERFACE COMMAND
COMMAND: CLOSE INTERFACE : 'Close Enslave Passengers Interface' / 'None'
PROCEDURE: Force display of a dynamically updating menu until ejection process has completed
Set process/dialog mutexes
Launch ejection script asynchronously
FORCE DISPLAY UNTIL COMPLETE + QUIT
Reset dialog mutex
PROCEDURE: DISPLAY SUBMENU EXPLAINING RULES
INFO: 'The number of passengers you can enslave and the bribes you can demand are determined by manpower and weaponry.'
INFO: 'NOTICE: You need at least %s to extort your passengers.'
INFO: 'NOTICE: You need %s or %s to enable special actions.'
INFO : 'The requirements you currently meet are highlighted below'
HEADING: 'Requirements' / 'Max Passengers / Max Bribe'
ITEM: '1 x Marine + Low-yield Sidearms' / '10 passengers, 25,000 credits'
Requirements Format := ActorType, ActorCount, WeaponType, MaxPassenger, MaxBribeID
LHS: '%s x %s + %s'. eg. '1 x Marine + Low-yield Sidearms' (Highlight text if requirement is met)
RHS: '%s passengers, %s credits'. eg '10 passengers, 25,000 credits' (Highlight text if requirement is met)
ITEM: '1 x Marine + Low-yield Sidearms' / '10 passengers, 25,000 credits'
HEADING: 'Actions Available'
COMMAND: EXIT : 'Return to Enslave Passengers Interface'
Display menu : 'Enslave Passengers' / 'BearCorp Technologies'
FUNCTION: Enumerate Passengers that have not been previously extorted
RESULT: aPassengers : Array of Passengers not been previously extorted, limited to the maximum allowable group size
RESULT: $PASSENGERS.COUNT : Size of above array $PASSENGERS.TOTAL : Actual number aboard not prev extorted
RESULT: $GROUP.SIZES : Passenger group sizes $GROUP.OPTIONS: Passenger group size comboBox values array
Exclude passengers that have previously been extorted
Limit passengers to maximum group size
Generate passenger group size selection array (Limit group sizes to multiples of 5)
Display as '%s passengers'
Add passenger count as final (default) value
Sort in descending order
FUNCTION: REDUCES RANKING WITH SECTOR OWNER, INCREASES RANKING WITH PIRATES
INPUT: $iRankPenalty : Positive amount to increase/decrease notoriety
Decrease ranking with race who own this sector
Core sector: Double decrease
Increase ranking with pirates
Re-calculate notoriety rank
FUNCTION: CHECKS WHICH REQUIREMENTS ARE MET BY USER (Req Format := ActorType, ActorCount, WeaponType, MaxPassenger, MaxBribeID)
RESULT: Initialises all BONUS.xxx constants
CHECK FOR MARINES and WEAPONS
Determine max bribe size + group size by comparing marines/weapons onboard to requirements
MATCH: Set maximum number of passengers enslaved (if larger)
MATCH: Set maximum bribe size (if larger)
EXTRACT BRIBE AMOUNT
ENABLE/DISABLE SPECIAL ACTIONS:
EXTORTION DISABLED HINT: '[Need 1 Sidearm]'
ENSLAVING DISABLED HINT: '[Need 2 Rifles + 1 Marine]'
MURDER DISABLED HINT: '[Need 3 Rifles + 2 Marine]'
FUNCTION: Match 'oRequirement' against the marines/weapons aboard (Format := ActorType, ActorCount, WeaponType, MaxPassenger, MaxBribeID)
RESULT: 'bMatch' : TRUE/FALSE
Pilot: Check the appropriate weapon is present
Marine: Check enough marines present + enough sidearms (for them and pilot)
Marine: Check enough marines present + enough rifles (for them and pilot)
PROCEDURE: Play speech clip: 'Cargobay now contains slaves'
